de.nec.nle.siafu.model
Class World

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.model.World

public class World
extends Object

This class represents the world being simulated. It is the main class in what concerns the simulation model. It contains all the agents, places and context overlays. This is the class you'll be coming to when writing your World, Agent and Context models. The methods in this class let you interact with the world, find agents, places, etc...

Author:
Miquel Martin

Whether the gradient cache should be prefilled to avoid hiccups at the GUI.

Parameters:
prefill - true to fill the cache with place gradients

createPlacesFromImages

protected ArrayList<Place> createPlacesFromImages()
Creates a place for each black pixel in the images contained in the simulation data. The place type is the name of the image.

Returns:
a list of places generated from the images in the simulation data.

findAnythingNear

public Trackable findAnythingNear(Position pos,
                                  boolean visibleOnly)
                           throws NothingNearException
Find a Trackable (Agent, Place, etc..) near the given position. The distance for "nearness" is set to NEAR_DISTANCE grid positions.

Parameters:
pos - the position in which to search
visibleOnly - set to true to filter out invisible Trackables near the position
Returns:
the first Trackable found
Throws:
NothingNearException - if nothing is found nearby

findAgentNear

public Trackable findAgentNear(Position pos,
                               boolean visibleOnly)
                        throws NothingNearException
Find an Agent near the given position. The distance is set to NEAR_DISTANCE.

Parameters:
pos - the position in which to search
visibleOnly - set to true to find only visible agents
Returns:
the first nearby Agent found
Throws:
NothingNearException - if nothing is found nearby

findPlaceNear

public Trackable findPlaceNear(Position pos,
                               boolean visibleOnly)
                        throws NothingNearException
Find a Place near the given position. The distance is set to NEAR_DISTANCE.

Parameters:
pos - the position in which to search
visibleOnly - set to true to find only visible places
Returns:
the first nearby Place found
Throws:
NothingNearException - if nothing is found nearby

findNearOutOf

public Trackable findNearOutOf(Position pos,
                               Collection<? extends Trackable> candidates,
                               int distance,
                               boolean visibleOnly)
                        throws NothingNearException
Find a Trackable that's near the given positions, out of the provided candidates.

Parameters:
pos - the position in which to search
candidates - the nearby trackables that we are willing to accept
distance - the distance in grid positions to consider a Trackable as being near
visibleOnly - set to true to find only visible trackables
Returns:
the first nearby trackable out of the candidates
Throws:
NothingNearException - if nothing

findAllAgentsNear

public ArrayList<Trackable> findAllAgentsNear(Position pos,
                                              int distance,
                                              boolean visibleOnly)
                                       throws NothingNearException
Find all the agents within distance grid positions.

Parameters:
pos - the position in which to search
distance - the maximum distance at which we consider the agent as being nearby
visibleOnly - set to true if only visible trackables should be returned
Returns:
a collection with all the agents near pos
Throws:
NothingNearException - if there's no agents nearby

visibleOnly - set to true if only visible trackables should be returned
Returns:
a collection with all the places near pos
Throws:
NothingNearException - if there's no agents nearby

pause

public void pause(boolean pause)
Pause the simulation.

Parameters:
pause - true if the simulation should be paused

stopSpinning

public void stopSpinning(boolean stop)
Make the world stop spinning with a single method call! Ok, this is identical to the pause method. Only funnier.

Parameters:
stop - true if you need a break and want to stop the world, false otherwise.

addMarker

public void addMarker(Marker m)
               throws GUINotReadyException
Add a Marker to the simulation GUI. If the GUI is not ready, this method performs no action a GUINotReadyException is thrown. If the GUI is not being used this method returns silently and does nothing.

Parameters:
m - the marker to add
Throws:
GUINotReadyException - if the GUI can not draw the mark at the moment.

unMarkAll

public void unMarkAll()
               throws GUINotReadyException
Remove all Markers from the simulation GUI. If the GUI is not ready, this method performs no action a GUINotReadyException is thrown. If the GUI is not being used this method returns silently and does nothing.

Throws:
GUINotReadyException - if the GUI can not draw the mark at the moment.

unMark

public void unMark(Trackable t)
            throws GUINotReadyException
Remove the Marker for this Trackable from the simulation GUI F. If the GUI is not ready, this method performs no action a GUINotReadyException is thrown. If the GUI is not being used this method returns silently and does nothing.

Parameters:
t - the Trackable to unmark
Throws:
GUINotReadyException - if the GUI can not draw the mark at the moment.

isMarked

public boolean isMarked(Trackable t)
                 throws GUINotReadyException
Find out if the given Trackable is marked in the GUI. If the GUI is not ready, this method throws a GUINotReadyException. If the GUI is not being used this method returns false.

Parameters:
t - the Trackable about which we are asking
Returns:
true if the trackable has been marked, false otherwise
Throws:
GUINotReadyException - if the GUI can not draw the mark at the moment.
